statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 61000. If she receives a raise of 4700 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-61000 = 39000. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{39000}}{{4700}}={8.2978723404255} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 9 years.
